products.name: Iphone
products.description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max is the ultimate flagship smartphone that offers cutting-edge technology, stunning performance, and an unmatched user experience. Powered by the new A16 Bionic chip, it delivers blazing-fast speed and exceptional energy efficiency. The Super Retina XDR display ensures vibrant colors and deep contrast, making every image pop. Equipped with a triple-camera system, including a 48MP primary sensor, the iPhone 16 Pro Max captures stunning photos and videos in any light. With 5G connectivity, ultra-fast performance, and all-day battery life, it's designed to meet the needs of even the most demanding users. Available in four striking colors, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is a perfect blend of style, power, and innovation.

specifications.Battery Life: Up to 28 hours of video playback
specifications.Colors: Space Black, Silver, Gold, Deep Purple
specifications.Sensors: LiDAR Scanner, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Barometer

products.name: Headphones
products.description: Experience unparalleled sound quality with these Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones. Equipped with advanced Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology, these headphones block out ambient noise, providing an immersive listening experience. Whether you're enjoying your favorite playlist or taking a call, the 40mm drivers deliver rich, clear audio with deep bass. With a battery life of up to 30 hours, you can enjoy extended listening sessions without worrying about running out of power. The lightweight design ensures comfort, making these headphones perfect for long hours of use. Plus, the built-in microphone and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity make hands-free calls and easy pairing with your devices a breeze. Ideal for travel, work, or just relaxing at home, these headphones offer a premium audio experience on the go.

specifications.Compatibility: Works with Android, iOS, and Windows devices

products.name: Smart Watch
products.description: monitor health metrics, and track your fitness in real-time. It comes with a 1.5-inch AMOLED display

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: A compact Bluetooth speaker that delivers rich, high-quality sound in a portable design. With Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, it ensures a stable connection and impressive audio performance. The speaker is water-resistant, making it perfect for outdoor activities. Enjoy up to 12 hours of continuous playback and make hands-free calls with the built-in microphone.

products.name: 4K Television
products.description: The 4K TV provides a true cinema experience with stunning Ultra HD resolution. HDR technology enhances picture quality by providing deeper blacks and brighter whites, offering more contrast and detail. With smart features built-in, you can access popular streaming apps like Netflix, YouTube, and Amazon Prime. Whether watching movies, gaming, or streaming content, this TV delivers an impressive experience.

specifications.Smart TV: Yes (Built-in apps for Netflix, YouTube, etc.)

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.description: A slim and lightweight fitness tracker that helps you monitor your daily activity, sleep patterns, and heart rate. With advanced sensors, it provides real-time insights into your health. Whether you're running, cycling, or doing yoga, this device helps you keep track of your progress and stay motivated.

products.name: Digital Camera
products.description: A high-performance digital camera that offers sharp images, fast autofocus, and versatile shooting modes. With a 24.2 MP sensor and 10x optical zoom, you can capture beautiful landscapes, portraits, and action shots. It also features a built-in Wi-Fi connection for easy photo sharing

products.description: A premium camera lens designed for clarity and precision. With a fast aperture and advanced optical features, this lens is perfect for capturing professional-grade photos in various conditions. Ideal for portrait and landscape photography

The ergonomic design ensures comfort during long hours of use, and the wireless technology provides freedom of movement.
